title: Crashing once for 3 mins gets me 20 min Q.
body:
Ever since the season 6 update my game has been crashed at the beginning of game and sometime at random time in game (This doesn't happen every game but when it does i will most likely lose the game and get a 20 min q). Don't tell me to reinstall the game I formatted my computer and reinstalled the game 3 time still doesn't help. The rate of crashing has decreased update after update but it still happens and sometimes I just don't load into the game and sit on a black screen until i restart the game.
****
_This happend after my team remade the game, just as I joined._
_If there is anyway you could help that would be greatly appreciated._

replies.body: The black screen you are experiencing may actually be due to your network having issues connecting to the game server, and not something reinstalling might resolve.  I recommend going over the steps in our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to get this fixed up for good.  Hit me up if you continue to have issues afterwards, and we'll dig deeper.
